text: Victor S. Gilliam (July 21, 1953 - June 18, 2020) was an American politician and actor. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was in the Oregon House of Representatives from the 18th District from his appointment in January 2007 until his resignation in January 2017. In November 2015, Gilliam was diagnosed with ALS. He died from the disease in Silverton, Oregon on June 18, 2020 at the age of 66.Former Oregon lawmaker Vic Gilliam, known for humor and bipartisanship, dies at 66 ==References== ==Other websites== * Vic Gilliam's office website * Vic Gilliam's campaign website * The Oregonian Your Government: Vic Gilliam, R-Silverton Oregon House District 18 Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from motor neurone disease Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Actors from Ohio Category:Actors from Oregon Category:Politicians from Ohio Category:Politicians from Oregon Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Vic Gilliam
